headline: These 2 Growth Stocks Have Been Hammered. Time to Buy?
summary: Two quality companies are on sale -- but only one looks like a dip worth buying right now.

headline: A Fresh Look at Intuitive Surgical (ISRG) Valuation Following New da Vinci 5 Software Innovations
summary: Intuitive Surgical (ISRG) just made waves by unveiling a suite of new software features for its da Vinci 5 robotic surgical system, signaling a fresh push to keep its platform on the cutting edge. This announcement, showcasing upgrades like the Force Gauge, In-Console Video Replay, and real-time Network CCM updates, feels like an open invitation for investors to reconsider the company’s long-term value. With FDA clearance already in hand, Intuitive is putting the spotlight on both innovation...
